thread.title_full: Ground News - It took 22 months and a lot of pressure but it finally happened: NATO has another ally

author: IOL Portugal
title: Ground News - It took 22 months and a lot of pressure but it finally happened: NATO has another ally
text:
Summary by IOL Portugal Sweden formally became a member of NATO this Thursday. The country's prime minister recognizes that Russia is an international threat and that Sweden feels more secure in the Atlantic Alliance. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
IOL Portugal It took 22 months and a lot of pressure but it finally happened: NATO has another ally Sweden formally became a member of NATO this Thursday. The country's prime minister recognizes that Russia is an international threat and that Sweden feels more secure in the Atlantic Alliance.
2 hours ago · Portugal Read Full Article
